project.description:
Linux kernel
Homepage: http://www.kernel.org
Downloads: http://www.kernel.org
loop-AES kernel module, compiled for the VIA C7 processor family
Homepage: http://loop-aes.sourceforge.net/
Downloads: http://loop-aes.sourceforge.net/loop-AES/

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash ### UNPACK LOOP-AES SOURCE & SET UP
. $HOME/src/jenkins/config.git/scripts/common_jenkins_functions.sh job_step_header "UNPACKING LOOP-AES ARTIFACT"
tar -Jxvf loop-aes.artifact.tar.xz
LOOP_AES_DIR=$(ls -1 ${WORKSPACE} \ | grep 'loop-AES' | egrep -v 'latest|log$')
cd ${WORKSPACE}/${LOOP_AES_DIR} make clean

#!/bin/bash ### DOWNLOAD KERNEL SOURCE, IF NEEDED
LOOP_AES_DIR=$(ls -1 ${WORKSPACE} \ | grep 'loop-AES' | egrep -v 'latest|log$') LINUX_KERNEL_VERSION=$(cat ${LOOP_AES_DIR}/linux-kernel.version)
. $HOME/src/jenkins/config.git/scripts/common_jenkins_functions.sh job_step_header "DOWNLOADING KERNEL SOURCE - ${LINUX_KERNEL_VERSION}"
/bin/bash $HOME/src/jenkins/config.git/scripts/download_tarball.sh \ --file linux-${LINUX_KERNEL_VERSION}.tar.xz \ --url https://www.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel/v4.x \ --log $WORKSPACE/wget.linux-${LINUX_KERNEL_VERSION}.log \ --outdir $TARBALL_DIR

#!/bin/bash ### UNPACK KERNEL SOURCE & SET UP
LOOP_AES_DIR=$(ls -1 ${WORKSPACE} \ | grep 'loop-AES' | egrep -v 'latest|log$') LINUX_KERNEL_VERSION=$(cat ${LOOP_AES_DIR}/linux-kernel.version)
. $HOME/src/jenkins/config.git/scripts/common_jenkins_functions.sh job_step_header "UNPACK AND SET UP KERNEL SOURCE - ${LINUX_KERNEL_VERSION}"
tar -Jxvf $TARBALL_DIR/linux-${LINUX_KERNEL_VERSION}.tar.xz cd ${WORKSPACE}/linux-${LINUX_KERNEL_VERSION} make distclean
LINUX_KERNEL_CONFIG="${HOME}/src/hostcfgs.git/combi/kernel_configs" LINUX_KERNEL_CONFIG="${LINUX_KERNEL_CONFIG}/config-${LINUX_KERNEL_VERSION}-viac7"
# check for the kernel config file if [ ! -f $LINUX_KERNEL_CONFIG ]; then job_step_header "ERROR: MISSING KERNEL CONFIG FILE" job_step_header "ERROR: ${LINUX_KERNEL_CONFIG}" exit 1 fi
# file should be there, copy it into the source tree cp $LINUX_KERNEL_CONFIG .config

#!/bin/bash ### BUILD LINUX KERNEL
LOOP_AES_DIR=$(ls -1 ${WORKSPACE} \ | grep 'loop-AES' | egrep -v 'latest|log$') LINUX_KERNEL_VERSION=$(cat ${LOOP_AES_DIR}/linux-kernel.version)
. $HOME/src/jenkins/config.git/scripts/common_jenkins_functions.sh job_step_header "BUILDING LINUX KERNEL - ${LINUX_KERNEL_VERSION}"
cd ${WORKSPACE}/linux-${LINUX_KERNEL_VERSION} time make -j4 CC=${BUILD_CC} INSTALL_MOD_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/output time make -j4 CC=${BUILD_CC} INSTALL_MOD_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/output modules time make -j4 CC=${BUILD_CC} INSTALL_MOD_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/output modules_install

#!/bin/bash ### ARCHIVE THE BUILD OUTPUT
LOOP_AES_DIR=$(ls -1 ${WORKSPACE} \ | grep 'loop-AES' | egrep -v 'latest|log$') LINUX_KERNEL_VERSION=$(echo ${LOOP_AES_DIR}/linux-kernel.version) LOOP_AES_VERSION=$(cat ${LOOP_AES_DIR} | sed 's/^loop-AES-//')
. $HOME/src/jenkins/config.git/scripts/common_jenkins_functions.sh job_step_header "CREATING BUILD ARTIFACT"
cd ${WORKSPACE}/output tar -cJvf ${WORKSPACE}/linux_loop-aes_artifact.tar.xz .

com.lookout.jenkins.EnvironmentScript.script: # set up the path to downloaded files echo TARBALL_DIR=${HOME}/source # set up path to an installed copy of GCC on `lagrange` echo BUILD_CC=gcc-4.9
